name: Spam Bot
tagline: Spam your friends with amazing efficiency using Node.js
body: # Platforms Currently, spambot can only be applied to Facebook Messenger #How to use 1. Install Node.js here 2. Install git here (or "brew install git" or "sudo apt-get install git" or "yum install git" or "pacman -s git" 3. Clone The Repo: "git clone https://github.com/TheTrueMaster/SpamBot" 4. Navigate into the directory ("cd SpamBot") 5. Install Required Dependencies: "npm install facebook-chat-api" 6. Run Program: "node '" 7. Spam Away! #Questions? email me @ contact@ronakshah.net
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
